sessionInfo()

# Data

```{r}
# data
MAGnum <- read.delim("input_matrix_v2.txt")
rownames(MAGnum) <- MAGnum[,1]
counts <- MAGnum[,-1]
counts[,1]
MAGcountsNum <- sapply(counts, as.numeric)
```

# Plot

```{r}
heatmap(MAGcountsNum)
```
